steps: 1. Carefully remove the solidified sample from the crucible. 2. Use sandpaper (grit 120 to 400) to smooth out any rough edges on the sample. 3. If required, apply a sealing agent to protect the surface and enhance durability, allowing it to cure for 24 hours before use.
